text:
Invia Group Germany| Android Developer (m/f) | Berlin, Germany | ONSITE | RELOCATION supported

The Invia Group is a pan-European market leader in online travel sales and brings together leading travel portals in Europe under one roof. From package holidays to tailored tours, from business trips to family breaks – our offers for tourists serve a wide range of target groups Among others, we operate the portals ab-in-den-urlaub.de, Hotelreservierung.de and Reisen.de. If you want to develop and build applications for millions of users and impact the future of online travel industry, join us!

We highly value stable and new technology, as well as building an excellent product that our customers love.

Our stack includes among others:

• Kotlin • Coroutines • Dagger 2 • Retrofit • Git • Travis Ci

To find out more and apply follow the link: http://bit.ly/AndroidDeveloperBerlin

In case you have any questions, do not hesitate and contact me.

Alexander.Schubert@invia.de
